content.raw:
Hi Musa,

Thanks for the reply. I've realized about the instability caused by added-mass with previous acceleration. 
I'll check how the work around is done.
Is there a way to validate that it's done right? The dynamics is quite complicated to validate, especially with the coupling terms in several DoF movements.
content.html:
Hi Musa,

Thanks for the reply. I've realized about the instability caused by added-mass with previous acceleration. I'll check how the work around is done. Is there a way to validate that it's done right? The dynamics is quite complicated to validate, especially with the coupling terms in several DoF movements.
